definition: to strive for/to vie for/to argue or debate/deficient or lacking (dialect)/how or what (literary)
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: This is a major point of contention.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個主要的爭論點。

sentences.english: Inventory is still an issue, according to the Wall Street Journal.
sentences.chinese: 根據華爾街日報，庫存清單仍是一個爭論點。

sentences.english: Taxation was the main issue in the investigation.
sentences.chinese: 稅收是調查的主要爭論點。
